A

Adds a card to the hand

Adds a Card (Soldier) to the Battalion.

B

Battalion - Class in zad.war
Definition of the cards with which a player plays War called Battalion as a metaphor.

Creates an empty Battalion.

Creates a Battalion of given Cards of a Card array.

C

Card - Class in zad
Card definition method with String value and Color that can be anything but it's preferable to use card symbols from the Unicode Table.
Card(String, String) - Constructor for class zad.Card
Constructor for Card
CardSet - Class in zad
Deck creation method, uses unicode card characters as card colors.
CardSet(boolean) - Constructor for class zad.CardSet
Creates a deck of one 52 or 54 card set.
CardSet(int, boolean) - Constructor for class zad.CardSet
Creates a deck of given card sets; Possibility to add jokers same as in main constructor CardSet
compareTo(Card) - Method in class zad.Card
Compare current card with given Card first by color then by value

D

drawCard() - Method in class zad.CardSet
Draws a card from the deck.

Gets the total cards of the deck, differs from available cards.
getValue() - Method in class zad.Card

toString() - Method in class zad.Card
Returns a String with the card value and color where the value is formatted to match the appropriate card symbol: 0 - Joker 1 - Ace 11 - Jack 12 - Queen 13 - King 14 - Ace

For debugging purposes
